thread.title: Betsy DeVos to Consider Fate of For-Profit College Accreditor

author: Michelle Hackman
title: Betsy DeVos to Consider Fate of For-Profit College Accreditor

organizations.name: accrediting council for independent colleges and schools

text:
WASHINGTONâ€”Education Secretary Betsy DeVos is facing one of the biggest decisions of her tenure: whether to effectively cut off federal funding for dozens of for-profit colleges serving more than 100,000 students across the U.S.
Mrs. DeVos must decide in coming months whether the Education Department will continue to recognize the Accrediting Council for Independent Colleges and Schools as an outside body with authority to evaluate colleges and universities. In April, she temporarily reinstated the accreditor after a federal...
